title: what is this police !!! / 'Cran Gevrier': display font
author: DUNANT

comments.content:
Call the fonts! Wait..., what?

PS. Sorry, don't know what it is, it looks custom. But you might have more luck in the Type ID forum.
(N.B., French = police, English = font.) (Sorry, I have no idea what the font is.)
Close, but no cigar: the police department of Mega City One!!!
Here, I thought "police" was a joking mispronounciation of "please".
Here, I thought "police" was a joking mispronounciation of "please".
I’ll move this thread to the appropriate place, the [Police Lineup Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015182158/http:/typophile.com/typeid).
